jobs.title: Senior Software Engineer
jobs.intro: Gumroad is a profitable, independent, and venture-debt-free tool for creators. We've paid out over $1 billion. Now, we're growing a high-density team in New York to reclaim our spot as the #1 creator economy tool. To get there, our core engine the path from a customer's "Buy" button to a creator's bank account must be the most reliable and frictionless infrastructure on the internet.
jobs.role_summary: You will own the integrity of the Gumroad economy. We process millions of dollars a week across every time zone. Your job is to ensure that code is fast, math is perfect, and money moves without fail.

responsibilities.title: Full Stack development
responsibilities.description: Build and maintain features across our entire stack, from database to user interface.

responsibilities.title: Product ownership
responsibilities.description: Take ownership of significant features and see them through from concept to production.

responsibilities.title: Code quality
responsibilities.description: Write clean, maintainable code and contribute to our engineering best practices.

responsibilities.title: Collaboration
responsibilities.description: Work closely with designers, product managers, open source contributors, and other engineers to ship great products. Review code and provide thoughtful feedback.

how_to_apply.description: Send a few sentences about your background and why you want to join Gumroad to jobs@antiwork.com.
Include a list of things you've built (with URLs). To skip the line, find an open issue in our GitHub repo, fix it, and get the PR merged.
If your work stands out, we'll have a conversation to see if we're a mutual fit.
4–6 week paid work trial where you ship real work for real creators. If it's a fit, you join the team.

jobs.title: Senior Designer
jobs.intro: Gumroad is a profitable, independent, and venture-debt-free tool for creators. We've paid out over $1 billion. Now, we're growing a high-density team in New York to reclaim our spot as the #1 creator economy tool. To get there, we need world-class design that makes every creator interaction intuitive, delightful, and effortless.
jobs.role_summary: You will own the look, feel, and usability of Gumroad. Every screen a creator touches, every flow a buyer completes — that's your canvas. Your job is to ensure the experience is clear, beautiful, and gets out of the way.

responsibilities.title: End-to-end product design
responsibilities.description: Own the design of creator-facing features from concept to launch, ensuring every pixel serves our creators.

responsibilities.title: Design systems and consistency
responsibilities.description: Build and maintain design systems that scale across web and mobile experiences.

responsibilities.title: User research and iteration
responsibilities.description: Talk to creators, understand their needs, and rapidly iterate on designs based on real feedback.

responsibilities.title: Collaboration
responsibilities.description: Work closely with engineers, open source contributors, and other designers to ship polished products.

stack.name: Frontend basics
stack.tech: HTML, CSS, understanding of React and Tailwind.

how_to_apply.description: Send a few sentences about your background and why you want to join Gumroad to jobs@antiwork.com.
Share your portfolio with case studies showing your design process and shipped work. Include links to live products you've designed.
If your work stands out, we'll have a conversation to see if we're a mutual fit.
4–6 week paid work trial where you ship real work for real creators. If it's a fit, you join the team.

responsibilities.title: Creator support
responsibilities.description: Help creators succeed by providing excellent support and guidance on using Gumroad.

responsibilities.title: Problem solving

responsibilities.title: Relationship building
responsibilities.description: Build strong relationships with creators and become their trusted advisor.

responsibilities.title: Product feedback
responsibilities.description: Channel creator feedback to the product team to help improve the platform.

how_to_apply.description: Send a few sentences about your background and why you want to join Gumroad to jobs@antiwork.com.
Include examples of how you've helped customers succeed, communication skills, and problem-solving abilities.
If your experience stands out, we'll have a conversation to see if we're a mutual fit.
4–6 week paid work trial where you support real creators. If it's a fit, you join the team.
